title: Ticket #7386: Starter should have better error when condor is not in docker group
description: If condor isn't in the docker group, condor will correct detect that it can't run docker. However, the error is obscure, so we should make a better error message in this case, as we've had several users hit this and not know how to fix the problem.
check_ins: 2019-Nov-18 15:54   Check-in [58499]: Remind admins to put condor into the docker group if docker fails #7386 (By Greg Thain )
creator: gthain
